summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3100, for the improvement of 20th Avenue West, from West Garfield Street to West Howe Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37749 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
